node.title: Man dead after 'incident' on main Bay of Plenty road, holiday travellers told to delay journey
node.content: ["A man has died in an \"incident\" on State Highway 35 near to Bay of Plenty's \u014cpape Beach.", "According to police, officers responded to the \"incident\" on the main road at 6:15am on Friday.", "It's now been confirmed a man has died and police are appealing for sightings or dashcam footage of a man on this part of the road on Thursday night or on Friday morning.\u00a0", "\"Police are making enquiries in relation to the death on behalf of the coroner and the coroner will release their finding in due course,\" police say.", "\"Anyone with information that could assist Police with enquiries is asked to contact 105 and quote job number P049061590.", "\"Information can also be passed on anonymously by contacting Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111.\"", "State Highway 35 is expected to be closed for some time and those wanting to travel to the East Cape and areas east of \u014cpape Beach are being advised to consider delaying their journey or take State Highway 2 \u014cp\u014dtiki and travel via Gisborne.", "Those travelling west from areas of the Cape should also delay their travel plans, police say."]
